content.raw:
Hi @Skylion007 ,
   on which branch are you experiencing this issue? 

 The fixed joint support still need to merged in the `default` branch.. are you testing the fixed joint PR [1] ? In that case I suggest that you comment the PR attaching the `sdf` that is causing a crash in Dart. 

If instead you are trying to simulate a fixed joint with a revolute joint with both max and min limits set to 0.0, I can confirm that Dart has problem with this kind of "degenarate" revolute joints. This is exactly the reason why I implemented proper fixed joint support in [1].

[1] :  #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1747/support-for-fixed-joints
content.html:
Hi @Skylion007 , on which branch are you experiencing this issue?

The fixed joint support still need to merged in the default branch.. are you testing the fixed joint PR [1] ? In that case I suggest that you comment the PR attaching the sdf that is causing a crash in Dart.

If instead you are trying to simulate a fixed joint with a revolute joint with both max and min limits set to 0.0, I can confirm that Dart has problem with this kind of "degenarate" revolute joints. This is exactly the reason why I implemented proper fixed joint support in [1].

[1] : #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1747/support-for-fixed-joints
